item.description:
Learn about all the advanced levels of the Enneagram - instinctual subtypes and subtype stacking, wings, stress and secure points, centers, tritypes, sequences, parental types, and all the subtleties of the Enneagram beyond just the basics! Learn from the master who has been teaching the Enneagram for 20 years.

2-6pm


($50 - Basic and Advanced together is $75 )

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., Counseling, is a leading authority on the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops in the last 20 years. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living. He uses the Enneagram is a psychotherapist, personal coach and is a trainer in organizations to help with team building and effective communication.
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.why: It's very valuable information to understand yourself and others more deeply. It goes way beyond the basic Enneagram information.
item.name: Enneagram Advanced Workshop
